Matches annotated elements with a Service annotation, or elements whose annotations have a Service meta-annotation attached to them.

findMetaAnnotation

public static <T extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> T findMetaAnnotation(java.lang.reflect.AnnotatedElement element,
                                                                               java.lang.Class<? extends T> annotationType)
Search for any annotations of the given type attached to this element, or that are attached to any annotations or meta-annotations on the element.

Parameters:
element - annotated element
annotationType - annotated type to search for
Returns:
attached annotation, or null if none exists
